# 학습 내용

![](fig/study_curriculum.jpg)

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| column: page

library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(readxl)

courses <- read_excel("data/curriculum_2023.xlsx", sheet = "level_01")

courses %>% 
  fill(c(일정, 과정)) %>% 
  mutate(과정 = str_remove(과정, "^\\d+\\.\\s+")) %>% 
  ## 표 작성
  gt(groupname_col = c("일정", "과정")) %>% 
  tab_options(table.align='center',
              table.width = px(600)) %>% 
  tab_header(
      title =  md("# 데이터 과학 교육과정")
    ) %>% 
  tab_style( 
    style = cell_text( size = "x-large", weight = "bold"),
    locations = list( cells_column_labels()  )
    ) %>% 
  tab_style( 
    style = cell_text( size = "x-large", weight = "bold"),
    locations = list( cells_row_groups() )
    )  %>% 
  tab_style( 
    style = cell_text( size = "large"),
    locations = list( cells_body() )
    ) %>%
  opt_table_font(
    font = list(
      google_font(name = "Dongle"),
      "Cochin", "Serif"
    )
  ) %>% 
  cols_align(
    align = "left",
    columns = 과정상세
  )  %>% 
  sub_missing(
    columns = everything(),
    rows = everything(),
    missing_text = ""
  )  

```
